description: Winner of the 39th Annual Telly Award in the How-To / Instructional category! Learn photography with renowned fine-art outdoor/nature photographer, workshop instructor, and seminar speaker, Tony Sweet. Tony takes viewers on a personal workshop experience through the Great Smokey Mountains National Park and into his studio to teach his digital image workflows and describe the real working environment of a successful professional photographer. This photography video was the first release in our series of photography workshops and has been a hit with photography students of all skill levels! With a run-time of more than 4.5 hours, this workshop is filled with practical shooting advice, tips, and all the secrets of a seasoned professional photographer.
title: Tony Sweet's Visual Literacy
